posts.post_content:
Very neat - "Elias B" makes another appearance on a T209-1 card!  I own three of them and have been keeping an eye out for more.  This is the first dupe, so far as I'm aware (I have a Crockett as well).  Good luck with the sale. 

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/Bliggity/t209-1/47230/t209-1-crockett[/IMG]
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/Bliggity/t209-1/47227/t209-1-bourquise[/IMG]
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/Bliggity/t209-1/47236/t209-1-pope[/IMG]

[quote name="Jersey City Giants" post=1637192]was he a collector?[/QUOTE]

Yes - here is a thread I started on him, which also links to a prior thread with some more information.

[URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=210841&highlight=elias"]Elias B[/URL]
